Name: The Overflow
Title: Candace: The Overflow
Desc: Those who do not respect the regulations at cards...\nAre the enemy of all who love the game.
Source: Reward for inviting Candace to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

Talent.Name: The Overflow
Talent.Desc:
$[K1]: When <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[A1207]</color> is your active character, equip this card.
After $[A1207] equips this card, she will immediately use <color=#FFD780FF>$[S12073]</color> once.
When this card is equipped by $[A1207], her <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C112072]</color> has the following extra effect: <color=#FFFFFFFF>After your character uses a Normal Attack: </color>Deals 1 $[K102]. (Once per Round)
(You must have $[A1207] in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

K1.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Combat Action</color>
K1.Desc: After you finish 1 Combat Action, it will be your opponent's turn.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>Playing a card from your Hand with this rule is also a Combat Action rather than a Fast Action</color>.

C112072.Desc:
Your characters' <color=#FFFFFFFF>Normal Attacks</color> deal +1 DMG.
Your Sword, Claymore, and Polearm-wielding characters' $[K100] is converted to $[K102].
<color=#FFFFFFFF>After you switch characters</color>, you deal 1 $[K102]. (Once per Round)

{SPRITE_PRESET#2102}{SPRITE_PRESET#2104}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Electro-Charged</color>：DMG +1 for this instance, deal 1 Piercing DMG to all opposing characters except the target
{SPRITE_PRESET#2102}{SPRITE_PRESET#2101}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Frozen</color>: DMG +1 for this instance, the target is unable to perform any Actions this Round (Can be removed in advance after the target receives +2 Physical or Pyro DMG)
{SPRITE_PRESET#2102}{SPRITE_PRESET#2107}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Bloom</color>: DMG +1 for this instance, creates a [<color=#FFFFFFFF>Dendro Core</color>] that grants +2 DMG to the next instance of Pyro or Electro DMG
